episode_event_ch0014_90_cheren_special/4:
A heart that desires strength and strives to grow
stronger...
I think that is a precious ideal.

That is why I respect you—because you have
one.

Please continue to the next room to face the Neo
Champions of Pasio!
Welcome to the Neo Champions’ room!

We’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

We’re as thrilled as we can be to battle here
against you, our first challenger since becoming
Neo Champions.
I love your style of Pokémon battling!

Somehow, your Pokémon always look like they’re
having so much fun!
Know what? I’ve been thinking lately...

Maybe Pokémon stay by our sides to bring people
together!

Even if they’re hurt, our Pokémon will fight for us
with just one command.

I think you’ll value and trust your Pokémon more if
you keep that fact close to your heart.

Fighting and getting hurt for the sake of others
isn’t something only Pokémon do for people.

What can we do for these friends who battle for
us? What should we do?

We battle with everything we have to find the
ideal relationship between Pokémon and people
while we’re here on Pasio—that’s what!

Now, I have a really important question to
ask you!
Who would you like to battle first: me, or Cheren?
Cheren
Thank you. You won’t be disappointed!
You, Bianca
Thanks! I’m gonna do my best!
All right, then. Let’s each take our places.
Yep!

You’re ready to go, right,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
